Leland follows the story of Leland P. Fitzgerald (Ryan Gosling), a disaffected teenager who has apparently murdered a severely retarded peer, the brother of his would-be lover and mentally unstable classmate Laura (Jena Malone). After the murder goes to trial, Laura defends Leland by testifying under oath that she felt a deep emotional and sexual relationship with him which led her to believe that he had not committed murder. The story is examined from each character's perspective
